title: Ep. 458 - All Human Conflict Is Religious
description:
A Muslim terrorist goes on a rampage, climate activists admit environmentalism isn’t about the environment, and Bernie Sanders calls Christianity un-American. We examine what all three stories have in common: all human conflict is religious. Date: 12-02-2019
